GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
net: xfrm: unexport __init-annotated xfrm4_protocol_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit ef6d2354de238b065d8799c80da4be9a6af18e39, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit 2f32b51b609faea1e40bb8c5bd305f1351740936. For more details please see the references link.
